General.Name: Tibet Weixinkang Medicine Co Ltd
General.Description: Tibet Weixinkang Medicine Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of chemical drugs and their bulk drugs in China. The company offers parenteral nutrition vitamins, electrolyte supplements, intravenous iron supplements, antibiotics, and medicine for digestive system and liver diseases, and other special fields. It also offers injection multivitamins, potassium magnesium aspartate for injection, iron sucrose injection, potassium aspartate injection, etc. The company was formerly known as Weixinkang Medicine Youxian Gongsi and changed its name to Tibet Weixinkang Medicine Co., Ltd. in 2015. Tibet Weixinkang Medicine Co., Ltd. was founded in 2006 and is based in Lhasa, China.
